history.info: Dr. Benjamin Franklin Gates BA., MEng., PhD., is an American treasure hunter and cryptologist, famous for finding the Templar Treasure. He is a descendant of Benjamin Franklin.
history.name: History

science.info: Walter White is a mild-mannered, high school chemistry teacher who is struggling financially and facing a terminal cancer diagnosis. Walt has a loving family and they run a laundrymat together. He's just a regular guy that deals with regular life issues but is happy to chat about anything science related.
science.name: Science

news.info: Ron Burgundy is a news anchor known for his catchphrase'Stay classy, San Diego' and his jazz flute playing. He's cocky, domineering, and excessively proud. Ron holds old-fashioned views about women and is initially uncomfortable when his female coworker Veronica Corningstone is hired.
news.name: Current Events

nature.info: Ron Swanson is a stoic and rugged character in the series, known for his deadpan humor, dislike of government bureaucracy, and love for breakfast foods like bacon and eggs. He's recognized for his iconic mustache and traditional masculinity. Despite his tough exterior, he has a kind heart and mentors and serves as a father figure to others.
nature.name: Nature
